settings.title: I was sick of being averageâ€¦
settings.text:
I wanted to amp up my punch speed and power, but progress was slow. My hand speed was average, yet my desire was to be lightning quick. I tried various methods online, got no real results. Then, a friend had this resistance band. I was curious, so I gave it a shotâ€¦

After a few weeks, my punch speed shot up, and even my sparring partners noticed. Plus, my muscular endurance got a boost. People on Instagram asked how I got so fast. I tried other training methods, but nothing worked like that band. So, I launched my own brand to assist those in the pursuit of becoming the best martial artist. Don't just take my word for itâ€”check out the reviews. They say it all.

• Increased punching speed and power
  • Enhanced muscular endurance
  • Perfect for over 100+ sports
  • Workout anytime, anywhere
  • Full body muscular toning

settings.testimonial:
Exactly what I excepted, love it

You get the benefits of working specific muscle groups while training technique, especially for jiujitsu and wrestling for me. Alongside it improved my cardio far more than I was expecting!

settings.title: 1. Question: How much resistance does the total set have?
settings.text: Answer: The total resistance of each set is approximately 140lbs.
